about_the_game:
This DLC contains a digital 14 pages artbook. In the artbook, you will find a collection of concept art, drawings, and sketches.
You will learn about the creative process of game development!
The artbook can be found in the main game directory.
Atrbook cames in .pdf format.
detailed_description:
This DLC contains a digital 14 pages artbook. In the artbook, you will find a collection of concept art, drawings, and sketches.
You will learn about the creative process of game development!
The artbook can be found in the main game directory.
Atrbook cames in .pdf format.
name: Your Home - Art Book

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, Mouse

short_description: This DLC contains a digital 14 pages artbook.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Azerbaijani, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Afrikaans, Basque, Belarusian, Bangla, Bosnian, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Dari, Zulu, Hebrew, Igbo, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Yoruba, Kazakh, Kannada, Catalan, Quechua, Kinyarwanda, K'iche', Konkani, Xhosa, Khmer, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Serbian, Sotho, Sinhala, Sindhi, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Uzbek, Uyghur, Urdu, Filipino, Hausa, Hindi, Croatian, Cherokee, Scots, Estonian
